required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of HNC042 in Healthy Subjects to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics.
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Sequential Parallel Group, Single and Multiple Ascending Doses (SAD/MAD) Study Following Intravenous Administration in Healthy Subjects to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of HNC042.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this First-in-Human study is to evaluate the safety , tolerability and pharmacokinetics after single ascending of HNC042 given to healthy subjects, compared to placebo. Also, the safety , tolerability and pharmacokinetics of multiple ascending of HNC042 given to healthy subjects daily for 7 days compared to placebo , will be evaluated.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of HNC042 in comparison with placebo after a single and multiple intravenous dose in healthy subjects in terms of adverse events

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal laboratory
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of HNC042 in comparison with placebo after single and multiple intravenous dose in healthy subjects in terms of abnormal laboratory

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal electrocardiogram
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of HNC042 in comparison with placebo after a single and multiple intravenous dose in healthy subjects in terms of abnormal electrocardiogram

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal physical examination
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of HNC042 in comparison with placebo after a single and multiple intravenous dose in healthy subjects in terms of abnormal physical examination

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal vital signs
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of HNC042 in comparison with placebo after a single and multiple intravenous dose in healthy subjects in terms of abnormal vital signs

secondary_outcome.measure: The amount of HNC042 in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between Day 1 predose and 24 hours after the (last) dose
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the amount of HNC042 in plasma over time - pharmacokinetics (PK) - after a single and multiple intravenous dose in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: The amount of HNC042 in urine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between Day 1 predose and 24 hours after the (last) dose
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the amount of HNC042 in urine over time - pharmacokinetics (PK) - after a single and multiple intravenous dose in healthy subjects

arm_group.description: HNC042,freeze-dried powder,single ascending doses Single dose,
Placebo single ascending doses , Intravenous route Single dose
HNC042,freeze-dried powder,multiple ascending doses, Intravenous route
Placebo, multiple ascending doses, Intravenous route,

intervention.description: HNC042,freeze-dried powder,single ascending doses Single dose, Intravenous route,starting dose of 100mg escalating up to 1200mg
Placebo single ascending doses , Intravenous route Single dose, matching placebo
HNC042,freeze-dried powder,multiple ascending doses, Intravenous route Multiple doses, daily for 7 days, anticipated doses: 300mg to 1200mg
Placebo, multiple ascending doses, Intravenous route, Multiple doses, daily for 7 days, matching placebo

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteer, age 18-56 years
- BMI between 18-34 kg/m2,and body weight not less than 50.0kg.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any condition that might interfere with the procedures or tests in this study
- Drug or alcohol abuse
- Smoking
